thread.title: ColourPop Free Shipping Sale | March 2017 Beauty
thread.title_full: ColourPop Free Shipping Sale | March 2017 | POPSUGAR Beauty

author: Perri Konecky
title: ColourPop Free Shipping Sale | March 2017 Beauty
text:
A post shared by ColourPop Cosmetics (@colourpopcosmetics) on Mar 24, 2017 at 8:47am PDT
ColourPop's amazingly affordable price points and high-quality products are two of the many reasons we love the brand. But when you're adding a new shade of the $6 Ultra Matte Lip to your cart every day, shipping costs can really do a number on your bill. On Thursday, March 30, ColourPop announced that for one day only, there will be free shipping on ALL orders, regardless of how many products you're ordering. Now we don't feel so guilty ordering a different $5 eye shadow to match every outfit we own. Shop now , and you can thank us later!
